# Dataset

```{r sono}
sono <- msleep %>% 
  select(name, vore, order, sleep_total)
```

# Mediana e quartis

```{r horas}
horas <- sono %>% 
  pull(sleep_total) %>% 
  sort()

horas
```

```{r len}
length(horas)
```

```{r mediana1}
horas[length(horas) / 2]
```

```{r mediana2}
median(horas)
```

```{r quartis1}
horas[
  c(
    length(horas) / 4,
    length(horas) / 2,
    3 * length(horas) / 4
  )
]
```

```{r quartis2}
horas %>% quantile(c(.25, .5, .75))
```

```{r media}
mean(horas)
```

```{r sumario}
summary(horas)
```

# Boxplots

```{r boxplot}
sono %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = sleep_total)) +
    geom_boxplot(fill = 'gray') +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = NULL) +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 20, 2))
```

```{r ogiva}
sono %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sleep_total)) +
    geom_step(stat = 'ecdf') +
    ylab(NULL)
```

```{r boxplots}
sono %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = vore, y = sleep_total)) +
    geom_boxplot(fill = 'gray') +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 20, 2))
```

```{r}
sono %>% 
  filter(vore == 'omni') %>% 
  pull(sleep_total) %>% 
  IQR()
```

```{r boxplots2}
sono %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = vore, y = sleep_total)) +
    geom_boxplot(fill = 'gray') +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 20, 2)) +
    geom_point(color = 'blue', alpha = .3) +
    stat_summary(
      fun = mean, 
      geom = 'point', 
      color = 'red', 
      shape = 'cross', 
      size = 5,
      stroke = 1
    )
```
